title: RHOSLC: That’s A Convenient Store Narrative
description:
This week on Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, Mary Cosby drops some problematic tidbits while Meredith's marriage falls apart before our eyes. But somehow it's all hilarious? Or at least fascinating.

Be sure to watch this recap with Crappens on Demand here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/44938807

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
